backend/main.mo: Actor defining storage, authorization, sitemap serving, and data models for applications, contacts, gallery items, and user profiles.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, missing frontend config module, and admin login error handling update.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configurations.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and custom CSS variables defining light/dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with SEO meta tags, Google verification, and root mounting for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring with TanStack Router, query client, theme provider, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/components/About.tsx: About section showing company features, services list, and styled cards with icons and images.
Handles application form input, file uploads with progress, validation, and submission via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/Benefits.tsx: Displays a grid of solar energy benefits with icons, descriptions, and a supporting image.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation and submission plus static contact details like phone, email, and address.
frontend/src/components/FiveKwSystem.tsx: Shows details, features, benefits, and suitability info for a 5kW rooftop solar system with supporting visuals.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with logo, slogan, copyright, and a credit link.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Fetches and displays gallery items or fallback images in a responsive grid with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, theme toggle, scrolling to sections, and admin/blog routing.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Hero section with background image, brand intro, CTAs scrolling to form/contact, and stats display.
frontend/src/components/PmSuryaScheme.ts: Section explaining PM Surya Ghar scheme with eligibility, documents, subsidy info, and process steps.
frontend/src/components/PromotionalPopup: Timed or scroll-triggered popup promoting a free site survey with close and CTA actions.
frontend/src/components/SEOHead.tsx: Utility component dynamically updating page title, meta tags, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and structured data.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Services section listing installation, maintenance, consultation, and green energy offerings with images.
frontend/src/components/VideoSection.tsx: Renders a video preview section with a thumbnail, play button, and three statistic cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient with stored identity support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend data and includes mock blog post data until backend support exists.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining solar-themed color variables, dark mode, gradients, and blog prose styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Admin dashboard page that handles login, role checks, sorting, filtering, and displaying PM Surya Ghar applications.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Displays a full blog post with SEO data, sharing options, and related posts, handling loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Shows a searchable, filterable list of blog posts with tags, SEO metadata, and navigation to post details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage layout including hero, services, gallery, contact sections, and SEO structured data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin usage.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, current issues, and required feature fixes related to Internet Identity login.
